plan.name: ACME Emergency Communications Plan
plan.description: Communications planning for responding and recovering from business interruptions due fire or power outage.

role.name: Emergency Manager
role.description: Organizes and leads response to fire; leads evacuation etc.

role.name: Evacuation Team Leader
role.description: Someone in charge of leading evacuations.

place.name: Warehouse type
place.description: A building used as storage space.

organization.name: ACME
organization.description: The ACME Corporation is a world leader in creative manufacturing services.
organization.mission: To provide versatile, just-in-time and agile manufacturing services to wile customers in hot pursuit of fast-moving opportunities.

phase.name: Responding
phase.description: Responding to an event as it unfolds.

scenario.name: Power outage
scenario.description: A power outage interrupts operations at main location.

risk.description: A power outage put at risk time-sensitive delivery contracts.

part.task: Overseeing data transfer and operations startup

flow.name: Find cause and duration of outage
Send key staff to Springfield to oversee operation

scenario.name: Business continuity
scenario.description: Provide a framework on which to resume critical business processes when normal work location and the resources in it are not accessible. The department plans are closely coordinated and supported by local management support staff for such areas as technology and office administrative assistance in establishing a continuous working environment.

risk.description: Delivery of services may be delayed.

eoi.content: Equipped with Battery powered lighting- Laptop with air card

flow.name: Work project status and impact of disruption

eoi.content: Outage duration Secretary Cell phone, need list and home numbers

connector.scenario-description: A fire starts during business hours on the lower level of the main printing facility. ACME needs to: 9- Respond immediately to the fire event. 8- Ensure the safety and health of colleagues 7- Assess any damage or impact of a situation 4- Identify and apply the necessary emergency activities 0- Manage and communicate information about the incident to parties deemed necessary
Managing the aftermath of a fire.

eoi.content: Power resumption status, jobs under way, when will job be completed. What will we do if the capability is not resumed by time X.

scenario.name: Building evacuation
scenario.description: Evacuating the building to minimize risk to personnel.

eoi.content: There is a fire. Everyone must evacuate the warehouse and proceed to the assembly area immediately.
Number of employees in assembly area and any missing
All occupants should evacuate to assembly area

scenario.description: Shutting down operations because of fire

scenario.name: Fire in the building
scenario.description: A fire starts during business hours on the lower level of the main printing facility. ACME needs to: 9- Respond immediately to the fire event. 8- Ensure the safety and health of colleagues 7- Assess any damage or impact of a situation 4- Identify and apply the necessary emergency activities 0- Manage and communicate information about the incident to parties deemed necessary

issue.description: Capturing sharing commitments between firemen and fire chief seems out of scope.
issue.remediation: Keep current flows between firemen and fire chief or remove any such flows or move them to another scenario

eoi.content: Provide complete information about the emergency including: the nature of the fire, location (site, building, and area within the building), number and location of any victims, their symptoms or injuries, the nature and spread of the hazard, and actions taken to stabilize the situation or protect life and property, any fire alarms zones that have been activated. Advise the fire department of the building entrance closest to the scene. If an explosion occurs, attempt to determine its cause. Hazardous materials. When the public fire department arrives, inform its Incident Commander of the nature of the emergency and action being taken. Provide building plans, master keys, and other information as requested.
Fire at ACME Location 100 Stark Road.

connector.scenario-description: Shutting down operations because of fire

scenario.name: Recovery after fire
scenario.description: Managing the aftermath of a fire.
